name: @exo/frontend-apps-banking

scripts.dev:csr: root-exec NODE_ENV=development CUSTOM_ENV=client dotenv -e ${FRONTEND_ENV_FILE:-.env} webpack serve --liveReload=false --hot=false --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.dev:ssr: root-exec NODE_ENV=production CUSTOM_ENV=client,ssr dotenv -e ${FRONTEND_ENV_FILE:-.env} webpack && root-exec NODE_ENV=development dotenv -e .env npm start
scripts.prod:app:banking: root-exec NODE_ENV=production npm run build && root-exec NODE_ENV=production npm start
scripts.start:csr:banking: root-exec NODE_ENV=production dotenv -e .env npm run start:csr
scripts.aem:build: rm -rf dist && root-exec NODE_ENV=development CMS_NAME=aem dotenv -e .env webpack
scripts.aem:build-and-deploy: npm run aem:build && npm run aem:package && npm run aem:deploy
scripts.test:e2e: root-exec start-server-and-test 'npm run test:e2e:start-test-server:$BACKEND' http-get://localhost:$PORT 'npm run test:e2e:run-cypress'
scripts.test:e2e:start-test-server:hcl: root-exec NODE_ENV=development CUSTOM_ENV=client dotenv -e cypress/.env.hcl webpack serve --watch-poll 6000000 --liveReload=false --hot=false --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.test:e2e:start-test-server:sap: root-exec NODE_ENV=development CUSTOM_ENV=client dotenv -e cypress/.env.sap webpack serve --watch-poll 6000000 --liveReload=false --hot=false --host 0.0.0.0
